title: Ticket #4596: Update CREAM for proxy handling
description: CREAM job submissions fail when using an RFC format proxy. The CREAM client library we're currently using (1.14.0) appears to screw up the delegation so that the delegated proxy isn't usable. The latest CREAM code fixes this problem. It probably has many other bug fixes as well.
remarks:
2014-Sep-17 14:28:59 by jfrey:
When upgrading to the latest CREAM packages, I want to start using the libcares provided by the OS, rather than building our own ancient version. This will require having the library available on our build machines and add a new dependency to our source RPM.
